title: Can we implement ping and emote muting?
body:
Getting spammed with the missing ping when you die is common practice now and having emotes spammed by the enemy champs can be annoying. All I'm saying is a wish I had the option to mute it. Muting all chat and teammates only does so much.

Edit: Maybe have it where you can't mute ping until 5 min in? That way you can see if your team has anybody on it that is going to be obnoxious with pinging.

replies.body:
Nothing to add, just voicing my support. Emotes specially are extremely obnoxious. I know technically you can use /ignore to block emotes, but there should be a more convenient way to do it. Making it so that the whole enemy team is ignored by default would be awesome too.

Well I guess I had something to add after all...
